text: Sibɨla 3.21 Lom 11.36, 16.27, Ib 13.21 akuaba akuaba Jisasɨ Kɨlaisɨ dɨ hɨvɨ lɨmi agasaŋ Asɨ dɨ ibi agadɨ hameŋ laci hameŋ laci mɨŋaiahaiaha pam hɨnimɨli uami. Hulaŋ iamɨgali avɨli hɨvɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahavɨmi agɨladɨ hɨvɨ sibɨla vilalɨ agasaŋ avi Asɨ dɨ ibi mɨŋaiahaiaha pam hɨnimɨli uami. Ha amɨŋ sɨbaŋ uami.
